titleStmt.title: Die Martis, 21. Februarii, 1642. Wheras [sic] in these times of eminent danger, there is by order of Parliament a fleet preparing, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright, dwelling in the Old-Bailey,

notesStmt.note: Title includes first lines of text.
A great fleet is being prepared which must be speedily manned. No ships are to leave the Thames till the fleet is manned, .. -- Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
